verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Lord Jesus, think on me And purge away my sin; From earthborn passions set me free And make me pure within.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Lord Jesus, think on me, With many'a care oppressed; Let me Thy loving servant be And taste Thy promised rest.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Lord Jesus, think on me Amid the battle's strife; In all my pain and misery Be Thou my Health and Life.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Lord Jesus, think on me Nor let me go astray; Through darkness and perplexity Point Thou the heav'nly way.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Lord Jesus, think on me When floods the tempest high; When on doth rush the enemy, O Savior, be Thou nigh!
